item.title: Journeys Beyond Dusk
item.description: ![[jyd.png]] Journeys Beyond Dusk Journeys Beyond Dusk (JBD for short) is my first Starforged campaign in the [[The Forge|Forge]]. I am using [[#Tools for Play|multiple tools]] to play this campaign. This campaign features [[Vuldar Jensen]] as the main character. Gameplay Sessions [[jbd-000|Session 000 : Worldbuilding & Character Creation]] [[jbd-001|Session 001 : Visit to Vesper]] Session 002 : Meeting Mina Session 003: Encountering Freyas' Wrath Tools for Play Stargazer by Nick Boughton.
